mapper.select: SELECT id, agent_id, client_id, client_name, client_type, sequence, step_prompt, create_time FROM ai_agent_flow_config WHERE agent_id = #{agentId} ORDER BY sequence ASC

SELECT f.id, f.agent_id AS agentId, f.client_id AS clientId, f.client_name AS clientName, COALESCE(m.model_name, '未配置模型') AS modelName, f.client_type AS clientType, f.sequence AS sequence, f.step_prompt AS stepPrompt, f.create_time AS createTime FROM ai_agent_flow_config f LEFT JOIN ai_client_model_config cm ON cm.client_id = CAST(f.client_id AS UNSIGNED) LEFT JOIN ai_client_model m ON m.id = cm.model_id WHERE f.agent_id = #{agentId} ORDER BY f.sequence ASC

SELECT f.id, f.agent_id AS agentId, f.client_id AS clientId, f.client_name AS clientName, m.agent_name AS modelName, f.client_type AS clientType, f.sequence AS sequence, f.step_prompt AS stepPrompt, f.create_time AS createTime FROM ai_agent_flow_config f LEFT JOIN ai_agent m ON m.id = f.agent_id ORDER BY f.agent_id ASC, f.sequence ASC
SELECT id, agent_id, client_id, client_name, client_type, sequence, step_prompt, create_time FROM ai_agent_flow_config WHERE client_id = #{clientId} ORDER BY sequence ASC
SELECT id, agent_id, client_id, client_name, client_type, sequence, step_prompt, create_time FROM ai_agent_flow_config ORDER BY agent_id ASC, sequence ASC
